name: Establishes Frame Transformations
description: Establishes the mathematical mappings that relate different observers' temporal perspectives while preserving essential coherence.
subject: urn:uor:resource:temporal-observer-frames
contextualDescription: The Temporal Observer Frames resource establishes transformations between different temporal reference frames, including how time coordinates, metrics, and flow properties transform, along with coherence preservation conditions and special classes of transformations like scale, flow, relativistic, topological, and compositional.
